content: Sarbani RoySearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationHomeSarbani Roy, PhDProfessorDepartment of Computer Science & EngineeringJadavpur UniversityKolkata, IndiaJU Web link:  https://jadavpuruniversity.in/faculty-profile/sarbani-roy/Office: Room No.: CC-5-7, 4th Floor Impact BuildingTelephone (O): +91 33 24572790Email: sarbani.roy@jadavpuruniversity.in; sarbani.roy@gmail.com Hello and welcome to my website!Here you can find information on my research work, teaching, supervision, publication, and other scholarly activities. The core of my teaching and research philosophy is active learning. I believe that continual learning is the most beautiful process in life that a human being can enjoy and, that certainly becomes very beneficial in all facets of life.My long-term research agenda is to involve a good mix of futuristic and present-day research.  I am interested in theoretical problems arising out of practical systems and societal issues.  My research group studies how information and communication technologies can address various research challenges.  I am very enthusiastic about the prospect of learning, contributing and making an impact in the real world.I hope you enjoy my website and find it useful!Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
